recipe.title: Smoked Salmon with Black Pepper Potato Chips
ingredients: 1/4 cup crème fraìche or sour cream
16 large black pepper or salt-and-pepper potato chips
1 4-ounce package thinly sliced smoked salmon, cut into 16 pieces
instructions: Stir crème fraìche and lemon peel in small bowl. Arrange potato chips on plate. Divide salmon among chips. Spoon rounded 1/2 teaspoon lemon crème fraìche atop salmon on each chip and sprinkle with chives.
